channel.title: How do I keep my server online without my server always up, if this is possible
channel.description: Okay, the only way i can keep my server online is if i keep my "server runner" on. If im playing my server with other peeps then exit out of the server runner, everyone gets disconnected. And i cant keep it up 24/7.. other people use this computer also. so... any help would be appreciated.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2009, 03:43:37 pm[/size][hr]HELP ME!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: How do I keep my server online without my server always up, if this is possible
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

dirgesreturn:

Okay, the only way i can keep my server online is if i keep my “server runner” on. If im playing my server with other peeps then exit out of the server runner, everyone gets disconnected. And i cant keep it up 24/7… other people use this computer also. so… any help would be appreciated.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2009, 03:43:37 pm[/size][hr]HELP ME!!!

Or you can purchase a VPS to host your files.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I keep my server online without my server always up, if this is possible

item.title: How do I keep my server online without my server always up, if this is possible
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

No. In order for people to play your server, it must be online, otherwise they’re not playing anything.

Read full topic
